scraped_content.markdown:

Buy gifts now, enjoy extended price protection through January 31, 2026. Some exclusions apply\*.

Shop Deals

Various apps that are part of a Microsoft 365 subscription, such as: Copilot, Designer, OneNote, Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Defender, Outlook, Clipchamp and OneDrive.

# Microsoft 365

Introducing Microsoft 365 Premium with our highest usage limits and exclusive Copilot features for AI power users.

Discover Microsoft 365 Premium

A Windows 11 laptop showcasing Copilot UI functionality.

Windows 11

## Meet the computer you can talk to

We typed, we clicked, now we're talking.

Meet Windows 11

Play/Pause

## Hi there. How can we help?

Ask me a question

Which PC is right for me?

Sign in to my account

How can my business use Azure?

Secondary Nav

Shop Surface devices

Shop Xbox games and consoles

Shop for accessories

Shop for your business

Find your next PC

Choose your Microsoft 365

A Sapphire blue Surface Pro tablet.

## Surface Pro

Works like a laptop, plays like a tablet. The 2-in-1 gift that adapts to everything ahead.

Shop now

A Surface Laptop, 7th Edition, a Copilot+ PC, in the color Sapphire.

## Get up to $600 with a qualified trade-in

Just in time for the holidays. Buy a select new Surface Laptop, Copilot+ PC by 12/31 and get extra cash back.

Shop nowLearn more about trade-ins

Mouse and Dock accessories for Surface devices

## Wrap up Surface accessories

Keyboards, mice and more designed to work seamlessly with Surface devices.

Shop now

A ROG Ally hand held gaming device.

## Xbox, anywhere

Experience seamless PC gaming on the go with the ROG Xbox Ally—the best of ROG and Xbox together in a handheld.

Shop now

An Xbox Series X in the color black.

## This is giving thrills that last all year

Unwrap Xbox Series X—the fastest, most powerful Xbox ever.

Shop Xbox Series X

## For business

Now available with 5G

A Surface Laptop for Business with optional 5G.

### Surface Laptop for Business, Copilot+ PC, 13.8 and 15-inch \| Intel

Uncompromising power, all-day battery life,\* unique AI experiences —featuring Intel® Core™ Ultra processors (Series 2). Now available with optional 5G connectivity.\*\*

Shop now

A Copilot interface says, "Hi, how can I help you?"

### Microsoft 365 Copilot

Save time and focus on the things that matter most with AI in Microsoft 365 for business.

Learn more

Visual Studio Icon.

### Visual Studio 2022

Get the most comprehensive IDE for .NET and C++ developers on Windows for building web, cloud, desktop, mobile apps, services, and games.

Download Visual Studio 2022

A laptop running Windows 11.

### Windows 11 for Business

Designed for hybrid work. Powerful for employees. Consistent for IT. Secure for all.

Learn more

## Get to know AI and Copilot

Illustration of a person using a laptop, symbolizing AI-assisted research in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

### Your new on-call assistant

Here are six ways Researcher, an AI agent in Microsoft 365 Copilot, can help you knock your toughest work tasks out of the park.

Learn more

Illustration of diverse medical professionals representing AI’s impact on modern healthcare.

### Rewriting the rules of modern medicine

AI is quietly transforming how we practice medicine, from diagnosing rare conditions to improving the patient experience.

Learn more

A forest wetlands landscape.

### The future of conservation

Researchers hope that a new AI tool will help biologists locate and restore bogs, marshes, and other vital wetlands.

Find out how

Skip Items

Showing 1 of 2 items

Back to Next and Previous controlsEnd of items

A glowing, blue nautilus-shell-like sculpture.

## Microsoft Digital Defense Report 2025

The cybersecurity landscape is evolving faster than ever—driven by AI-powered attacks, ransomware-as-a-service, and increasingly sophisticated nation-state operations. Stay informed to defend against what’s next.

Uncover key insights

A Costa Rican Red Cross worker cradles an infant inside an ambulance, symbolizing compassion and humanitarian aid.

## The lifeline behind every rescue

Digital tools from Microsoft are helping power progress for the Costa Rican Red Cross and local communities.

Read the storyPlay/Pause

## Follow Microsoft

metadata.description: Explore Microsoft products and services and support for your home or business. Shop Microsoft 365, Copilot, Teams, Xbox, Windows, Azure, Surface and more.
